problem_text: If m \angle C F D = 12 a + 45, find a so that \overrightarrow F C \perp \overrightarrow F D.
compact_text: If m \angle CFD = 12a+45, find a so that \overrightarrow FC \perp \overrightarrow FD.
annotat_text: If $m \angle CFD=12 a+45$, find $a$ so that $\overrightarrow {FC} \perp \overrightarrow{FD}$.
